jobDescription: Location: Primarily remote. However, must be able to work onsite for initial training in Troy, MI (48083).Maintains the General Motors Corporate Supplier Identification Source (CSIDS). This Database is set up to track all activity and supplier information globally.KEY RESPONSIBILITIESPROCESS CUSTOMER REQUESTS by reviewing data for deficiencies; resolving discrepancies by using standard procedures or returning inaccurate documents to the supervisor for resolution.VERIFIES INFORMATION by searching Dun & Bradstreet databases using established search criteria; identifying appropriate Duns for legal company name and address.PRODUCES INFORMATION by initiating telecommunications to verify supplier data if not identifiable in D & B.PREPARES SOURCE DATA FOR COMPUTER ENTRY by compiling and sorting information; establishing entry priorities.ENTERS SOURCE DATA by inputting alphabetic and numeric information according to CSIDS screen format and customer policies.MAINTAINS HISTORICAL RECORDS by documenting system changes and revisions and storing documentation for a three month period.REQUESTS INFORMATION AND UPDATES by contacting D & B via electronic mail; initiating investigation to update or establish supplier records.ENSURES CUSTOMER AND USER SATISFACTION by resolving open issues by providing instructional information as requested.MAINTAINS OPERATIONS by following policies and procedures; reporting needed changes.CONTRIBUTES TO TEAM EFFORT by accomplishing related results as needed.PREPARES ALL DESIGNATED CDI AND CUSTOMER PERSONNEL TO USE THE SYSTEM by conducting training sessions.MAINTAINS PROFESSIONAL AND TECHNICAL KNOWLEDGE by attending educational workshops.DISCLAIMER: The above essential functions are a summarized list. It is not intended to be a complete list of all the duties and responsibilities.PERFORMANCE CRITERIADemonstrates LeadershipInfluences others by exampleMeets goals and objectivesMaintains positive relationshipsActs with IntegritySound business ethics are consistentFollows through on commitmentsHonest and fair with allManages ExecutionEstablishes priorities for his/her workManages time wellHandles paperwork effectivelyAchieves ResultsAction-orientedDoesn't wait to be told to take actionPersists despite obstacles and oppositionShows Work CommitmentSteps up to responsibilitiesSets high standards of performanceChampion of corporate valuesTeam PlayerSupports team goalsHelps othersFocuses on team successDemonstrates AdaptabilityHandles day-to-day work challenges confidentlyWilling and able to adjust to multiple demands, shifting priorities, ambiguity and rapid changeShows resilience in the face of frustration or adversityCommunicates EffectivelySpeaks in a clear, articulate and concise mannerPays attention when others are speakingChecks and validates for understandingQuality-FocusedDemonstrates commitment to qualitySupports QBS initiativesAdds value to the organizationJOB QUALIFICATIONSPersonal Characteristics Aligned with Performance CriteriaDemonstrates leadershipActs with integrityManages executionAchieves resultsShows work commitmentTeam playerDemonstrates adaptabilityCommunicates effectivelyQuality-focusedJob-Related Knowledge, Skills, AbilitiesKnowledge of corporate policiesComputer skills in Windows XP of HigherAbility to handle multiple tasks simultaneouslyOrganization and time management skillsAbility to use analytical thought processActive listening skillsEducationHigh school diploma required; Associates Degree or applicable professional experience preferredJob-Related ExperienceBackground in an office environment with strong telecommunication skillsOrder Desk/Help Desk background preferredJOB QUALIFICATIONSPersonal Characteristics Aligned with Performance Criteria•Demonstrates leadership•Acts with integrity•Manages execution•Achieves results•Shows work commitment•Team player•Demonstrates adaptability•Communicates effectively•Quality-focusedJob-Related Knowledge, Skills, Abilities•Knowledge of corporate policies•Computer skills in Windows XP of Higher•Ability to handle multiple tasks simultaneously•Organization and time management skills•Ability to use analytical thought process•Active listening skillsEducation•High school diploma required;
